Comment.val: /*Functie om de indirecte portefeuille based kosten en gemiddelde portefeuille tebrekenen over de persistent vastgeleged performance bedragen. Indien nodig worddt er berekend, anders wordt alleen geaggregreerd. */

SQL_STMT_U.val: select sum(a.amount * a.factor), m.cfcu_id from pc_portfolio_amount a inner join pc_portfolio_base b on b.id = a.pcpb_id and a.pcca_id>1 and b.calc_date between ~2 and ~3 inner join performance_report r on r.id =b.pere_id and r.ppr_id = ~1 inner join pc_category c on c.id = a.pcca_id inner join map_calcrule_perf_cat m on m.pcc_cat = c.code group by m.cfcu_id
select sum(value) from pc_account_base a inner join performance_report r on r.id = a.pere_id and a.calc_date between ~2 and ~3 and r.ppr_id = ~1
select sum(value) from pc_portfolio_base a inner join performance_report r on r.id = a.pere_id and a.calc_date between ~2 and ~3 and r.ppr_id = ~1

select sum(a.amount * a.factor) indirect_cost from pc_portfolio_amount a inner join pc_category c on c.id = a.pcca_id and c.code in (1) inner join pc_portfolio_base b on b.id = a.pcpb_id and b.calc_date between ~2 and ~3 inner join performance_report r on r.id = b.pere_id and r.ppr_id = ~1

select sum(a.amount * a.factor) indirect_cost from pc_portfolio_amount a inner join pc_category c on c.id = a.pcca_id and c.code in (54,55,56,59,60) inner join pc_portfolio_base b on b.id = a.pcpb_id and b.calc_date between ~2 and ~3 inner join performance_report r on r.id = b.pere_id and r.ppr_id = ~1
